data.author: Lisa Fickenscher
data.title: Retailers take $100B hit over bogus returns: ‘Sent back box of bricks instead of TV’
data.description: Retailers are facing another threat to their bottom line from scammers who are stuffing bricks, fake receipts and counterfeit goods in return packages.

data.title: Federal judge says Alabama can carry out nation's 1st execution using nitrogen gas; appeal likely
data.description: MONTGOMERY, Ala. (AP) -- Alabama will be allowed to put an inmate to death with nitrogen gas later this month, a federal judge ruled Wednesday, clearing the way for what would be the nation's first execution under a new method the inmate's lawyers criticize as cruel and experimental.

data.author: Nicky Andrews
data.title: Remaining Flagstaff Road murder defendant sentenced to 26 years in prison
data.description: The remaining defendant related to the death of Alexis Baca, who was fatally shot on Flagstaff Road in 2022, has been sentenced to 26 years in prison.

data.author: Rhett Brinkley
data.title: WLR Texas Roadhouse back open after dumpster fire yesterday
data.description: A fire broke out in the back exterior dumpster area of West Little Rock’s Texas Roadhouse Tuesday afternoon at 2620 S. Shackleford Road. Several pictures posted to social media yesterday made it look like the whole building was engulfed in flames.The post WLR Texas Roadhouse back open after dumpster fire yesterday  appeared first on Arkansas Times.

data.author: Caley Gibson
data.title: Edmonton police charge man with numerous drug and weapon offences
data.description: At about 6 p.m. Sunday, police in the area of 118 Avenue and 104 Street said they saw a man who was wanted on 12 outstanding firearm-related warrants.

data.description: If Jeanie Buss and Rob Pelinka don't intend on making a coaching switch this season, the expectation is that they will once again be active around the Feb. 8 trade deadline

data.author: Jarrad Saffren
data.title: The Running Rabbi, Binyomin Davis, Qualifies for Boston Marathon
data.description: At his Kol Nidre service this past year, Rabbi Binyomin Davis told his Aish Chaim congregants a story. In the 2022 Philadelphia Marathon, Davis was running with his son, Ezy, biking alongside him. Ezy could see his father racing hard but slowing down. So, he called out to his old man. “Im lo achshav, eimatai?” […]The post The Running Rabbi, Binyomin Davis, Qualifies for Boston Marathon appeared first on Jewish Exponent.

data.author: David Pierce
data.title: The TVs, monitors, and laptops of CES 2024
data.description: Image: Alex Parkin / The Verge Another year, another CES, another batch of big and strange ideas about displays. CES may not be quite the TV-centric show it once was, but you practically can’t turn around in the Las Vegas Convention Center without encountering a new way to use LEDs. For the first of our two Vergecast episodes live from the Kia Connected Home at CES this week, we dug into the most important new screens of the year. That means TVs, monitors, laptops, smartphones, and all the other display-centric things we’ve seen so far. (On Friday, we’ll get to all the cars, smart home...

data.title: El CSIC alerta de que el pélet plástico tarda unos 100 años en degradarse
data.description: Urge a localizar el resto de carga vertida en las costas del norte de España La directora del Instituto de Diagnóstico Ambiental y Estudios del Agua (IDAEA-CSIC), Ethel Eljarrat, ha estimado en unos 100 años el tiempo que tarde en degradarse el pélet plástico y ha urgido a localizar el resto de la carga vertida en el norte de España antes de que lleguen más contaminantes a las costas españolas. En una entrevista de Europa Press, Eljarrat ha lamentado que desconocen "cuáles son exactamente los aditivos químicos" que estos pélets tienen asociados pero ha advertido de que, en función...

data.author: Sara Todino
data.title: La recensione di “Safe”, miniserie gioiellino di Netflix
data.description: Sappiamo tutti come spesso va con le serie thriller: iniziano bene, con un caso accattivante che suscita subito l’attenzione e la curiosità, per poi però perdersi puntata dopo puntata con banalità scontate, digressioni noiosissime sulle vite private dei personaggi e soprattutto inutilità buttate lì giusto per allungare la trama, preparando il terreno per le stagioni […]L'articolo La recensione di “Safe”, miniserie gioiellino di Netflix proviene da Wonder Channel.

data.author: Spc. Trevares Johnson
data.title: GAS, GAS, GAS! Iron Soldiers Execute CBRN Training [Image 9 of 9]
data.description: A soldier assigned to the 47th Brigade Support Battalion, 2nd Armored Brigade Combat Team, 1st Armored Division, prepares to don a gas mask inside a gas chamber during chemical, biological, radiological, and nuclear training at Drawkso Combat Training Center, Poland on Jan. 10, 2024. The gas chamber is a room that has a controlled concentration of CS (orto-chlorobenzylidene-malononitrile) gas, more commonly known as tear gas. Soldiers conduct mask confidence training by demonstrating the effectiveness of personal protective equipment in protecting against chemical, biological, radiation, and...
